alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ST. LOUIS, NORTHEASTERN CARLTON AND NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saginaw, or near Cloquet, moving east at 50 mph. Other scattered thunderstorms were also moving through the region. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Superior, Cloquet, Hermantown, Proctor, Scanlon, Poplar, Oliver, Brookston, Saginaw, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, Pike Lake Near Duluth, Wisconsin Point, City of Rice Lake, French River, Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, Grand Lake, Mahnomen, Irving, and Cody. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
